Datatable.LocalizationPair: The good news: This is a water-rich planet and therefore of great value to agriculture. The bad news: This water is generally delivered horizontally in your face by gale-force winds, flooding roads and making the population wet and miserable.

Rich in deposits of copper, iron, zinc, and other metals, the lakes and geysers of this planet are stunning to behold but intolerable to plant life. At least the high metal content of the waters is a boon to industrial development, as highly purified ores can be obtained through simple filtration.

With an unusually long orbital ellipse, the planet has very long seasons and thus is exposed to extremes of cold in winter and heat in summer. While a few people insist you "get used to it", the weather is challenging for agriculture and raises the cost of living.

Search teams discover ruins of one of the many ancient civilizations that have risen and fallen since the birth of the universe. Although primitive, the structures are beautiful, and the tourism industry could benefit greatly from this rare find.
Enhance Garden of Eden
Start up a think-tank, working out how you can possibly make this world even nicer than it already is.
Garden of Eden

The hardest thing about enhancing this planet was working out how a perfect world could be made even better. Ultimately, your ecologists took a different approach - the planet's mild seasons and lack of significant tectonic activity made it ideal for construction of a series of delicate climate-controlled domes, exhibiting the ecologies of countless other worlds from parched deserts to frozen tundras.
Enhance Dust Ruins
Cordon off the dust ruins and study them, before someone plunders them for their riches.
Dust Ruins

Although the first instinct of the local industry leaders was to plunder the Dust ruins for their riches, long-term thinking prevailed, and they were instead carefully excavated and exhibited for the benefit of all.
Enhance Friendly Locals
Work with the native population to build a more multicultural society.
Friendly Locals

Integrating the planet's native people and culture into their society from the start, and acting as guests rather than colonizers, this world's population have become more accepting of others. The multicultural society here is a wonderful working environment for all the myriad species of your empire.
Enhance Rich Soil
Develop new farming techniques specific to this planet and its unique soil composition.
Rich Soil

While ultra-intensive farming techniques risked depleting even the bountiful soil of this world, a study of rainforest plants and soil bacteria found ways to efficiently renew all the nutrients. The planet's food productivity is remarkable.
Enhance Mineral Deposits
Exploit this planet's rich mineral deposits.
Mineral Rich

The planet's bountiful crust has been a blessing for the economy, once the initial lawless free-for-all was reined in. Now, land deeds are correctly recorded, deep-mining operations appropriately regulated, and even most of the original pollution has been cleaned up.
Enhance Hadopelagic Life
Construct a deep-sea laboratory to study the planet's remarkable oceanic life.
Hadopelagic Life

It took a lot of doing, given the frankly murderous pressures involved, but your empire succeeded in constructing an ultra-deep-sea laboratory to study this planet's unique life-forms. People being as they are, it was soon followed by the galaxy's deepest underwater hotel, a lunatic endeavor that has nevertheless been pulling in tourists from far and wide.
Enhance Antonov Rings
Construct a swarm of gatherer satellites to harvest valuable Dust from the planetary rings.
Antonov Rings
Believed to have been formed from the shattered remains of a once-colonized moon, this asteroid band is a rich source of Dust, and fascinating to the scientific community.
Enhance Huygens Rings
Construct a swarm of research satellites to study the planetary rings.
Huygens Rings
The remains of the protoplanetary disc, and now laced through with research satellites, this asteroid band is a unique glimpse into planet formation.
Enhance Hollow Planet
Explore the cave network and begin putting these remarkable underground spaces to use.
Hollow Planet

Although new, deeper caves are still being discovered to this day, the majority of the planet's vast caverns have been explored, reinforced, studied, and repurposed for industry, research, or some of the galaxy's most unique housing.
Enhance Ice-10
Study the mysteries of Ice-10, and see if you can make use of it.
Ice-10

A rare form of ice that is caused by water crystallizing under high pressures, Ice-10 is interesting for its thermodynamic properties - which have been thoroughly studied, such that the fascinating substance can now be used in superconductor construction.
Enhance Permanent Monsoon
Develop new crop species that can thrive in the monsoon weather.
Permanent Monsoon

Once a very wet and very difficult environment, a concerted effort to partially terraform the planet has lessened the intensity of the winds and storms - and developed some of your empire's most productive farms.
Enhance Metallic Waters
Roll out a line of artificial soil microbes that can tolerate the planet's conditions.
Metallic Waters

Almost dirt-free, the hard, gleaming surface of this planet used to make agriculture difficult and potentially poisonous. Newly-developed artificial soil microbes not only sequester toxic metal salts from the water, but package and serve them up on a silver platter for local chemical industries.
Enhance Aurora Waves
Promote a new tourist industry on this beautiful planet.
Aurora Waves
The gleaming, multi-colored auroras that once caused such headaches have been tamed by magnetic shielding. Their beauty remains undisturbed, and draws tourists from far and wide.
Enhance Dense Atmosphere
Selectively breed new macrofauna to take advantage of the dense atmosphere.
Dense Atmosphere

As any xenobiologist knows, a denser atmosphere is one of the requirements for animal life to grow to gargantuan sizes. This planet once lacked such titans, but through selective breeding, you now have some beasts big enough that you can put the pasture on them rather than the other way around.
Enhance Psychoactive Air
Set up a network of filtration systems to reduce the effects of the planet's atmosphere on your populace.
Psychoactive Air

With an atmosphere that was once saturated by complex chemical compounds, life on this planet was challenging. These days, vast filtration stations ensure that the various psychoactive compounds are available only when they're desirable.
Enhance Geothermic Activity
Sink thermal rods deep into the planet's crust to tap the geothermal heat and reduce volcanic hazards.
Geothermic Activity

Applying enormous amounts of energy and grappling with gravitational alterations, the previously uncontrollable geothermic activity of the planet is not only manageable, but actually useful since every new factory can have its own dedicated geothermal generator.
Enhance Seismic Activity
Power up a deep-crust network of gravitational flux columns to tame the planet's seismic forces.
Seismic Activity

By manipulating the magnetic core, stabilizing continental drift, and improving construction techniques, the problems in daily life caused by seismic activity have been largely solved - and on top of this, some amazing new scientific developments came out of the project.
Convert Long Season
It might seem like a mad endeavour, but you have enough power at your disposal - change the planet's axial tilt, and make the seasons more bearable!
Enhance Meteor Strikes
Upgrade your defensive satellite network to capture and mine the meteors.
Meteor Strikes

The previously named "killer satellites" are now less like assassins and more like goalkeepers. Thanks to cheap and robust sources of energy and innovations in shield technology, incoming meteors are captured and mined for their valuable ore deposits.
Convert Polar Tempests
Ramp up the climate control until the polar tempests subside entirely. This will make the atmosphere much denser overall, and more amenable to crop growth.
Convert Strong Magnetic Field
Take advantage of the naturally strong magnetic field to create a defensive plasmasphere over the entire planet.
Convert Kessler Syndrome
Sweep the orbital debris into neat (and attractive) rings.
Convert Acid Rain
With the acid rain under control, maybe those volcanic fumaroles can be made useful for industry?
Convert Irradiation
Study the plant-life of this once-irradiated world, and see what bounty you find.
Enhance Hostile Fauna
Domesticate this planet's magnificent predatory beasts.
Hostile Fauna
While the beasts of this planet were first described as "giant," "primal," and "impressive," these days the adjectives would tend to "companionable," "obedient," and "just the right size to ride on."
Enhance Ancient Ruins
Excavate and study the ancient ruins.
Ancient Ruins

The ruins here have been painstakingly excavated, and regrettably, we must conclude that the former inhabitants of this planet were a primitive, pre-electricity species, whose scientific knowledge offers us nothing new. However, the excavated ruins are breathtaking in their beauty, and tourism is booming.
Enhance Dust Lode
Chart the dust lodes and try to find out where they're coming from.
Dust Lode
By following the traces of Dust embedded in the world's crust, our scientists have uncovered - and repurposed - the fortified subterranean bases of the Endless that put it there.
Enhance Coral Reefs
Set up a conservation programme to preserve the natural beauty of the coral reefs.
Coral Reefs
This world's carefully-conserved coral reefs are now a symbol of natural beauty recognised galaxy-wide.
Enhance Cyber Flora
Study the odd cybernetic flora, and see if it can be put to good use.
Cyber Flora

The so called "cyber-lichen" turns out to form a natural neural network under certain conditions. This allows for vital components of research mainframes and espionage supercomputers to be grown on agar plates rather than built.
Enhance Strange Fossils
Study the fossils, and see if they can become more than just a curiosity.
Strange Fossils

Your scientists have discovered connections between the ecology of the ancient, now-fossilised organisms here and the mineral deposits in the system. Working from this knowledge, new resource veins can be uncovered.
Enhance Microfactories
Study the atmospheric microfactories, and see if they can be controlled.
Microfactories
Now that the control codes for the Endless microfactories have been deciphered, their effects on food production can be boosted.
Enhance Mutated Flora
Catalogue the world's extensive array of mutant flora.
Mutated Flora

We've finally catalogued exactly which of the absurd profusion of flora on this planet are toxic, allergenic, or violently motile. The gourmet food industry is more diverse than ever, and being an experimental chef requires less hazard pay.
Enhance Low Gravity
Adapt the local architecture to take advantage of the low gravity.
Low Gravity
Local architecture has adapted to take advantage of the low gravity - soaring bridges and towering needle-like spires are the order of the day, and all available with low-cost materials.
Enhance Deserted Cities
Conduct archaeological studies of the deserted cities.
Deserted Cities

With the archaeologists' work finally finished, reconstruction and resettlement of the world's deserted cities has begun. Many buildings have been preserved in their original state, as monuments to those who came before, while others become industrial centres or research institutes.
Enhance Molten Springs
Build refineries to harvest the molten metal output.
Molten Springs

Refineries built over the planet's miraculous molten springs extract and refine valuable materials from the gouts of white-hot metal - although a few have been left pristine as spectacular (if dangerous) tourist destinations.
Enhance Shattered Crust
Encourage a tourism industry to admire the breathtaking natural landscape.
Shattered Crust

The surface of this planet is a riot of cliffs, chasms, ridges, and spikes, now traversed by soaring bridges, pierced with spectacular tunnels - and offering wonderful views to airships full of tourists.
Enhance Komatiite Volcano
Study the planet's upper mantle, with an eye to artificial volcano formation.
Komatiite Volcano

A thorough study of the local geology has revealed ways to trigger the formation of new komatiite volcanoes on demand. Industry leaders now regard the planet's upper mantle as a sort of vending machine: Insert explosives, receive magnesium.
Enhance Propitious Seasons
Redesign your cities to take advantage of the seasonal variations.
Propitious Seasons
The cities on this planet have been designed with the seasonal weather in mind, so no-one is too hot or too parched in the summer or too cold, wet, or depressed from lack of sunlight in the winter.
Enhance Humeris Insidentes
Extract every last scrap of knowledge from the bunkers.
Humeris Insidentes

Now that all of the knowledge banks and valuable archaeological finds from this planet's bunkers have been extracted, catalogued, stored and studied, the bunkers themselves - miles upon miles of subterranean tunnels - can be repurposed for your own data-centres and scientific archives.
Enhance Poor Soil
You've enriched the planet's soil to be able to support some crops - why stop there? You already have the infrastructure in place, so keep at it until you have an agricultural paradise.
Enhance High Gravity
Crank up the Graviton Bleed Engine to higher power levels, and you might be able to get the gravity even lower! Or the planet might fall apart, but probably the other thing.
Enhance Behemoth Song
Construct orbital habitats specially designed to channel the behemoth song.
Behemoth Song
Orbital habitats have been constructed after the model of opera houses and amphitheatres, to allow everyone to experience the planet's haunting, ethereal song.
Enhance Talking World
Study the mysterious radio transmissions.
Talking World

Dedicated signal backtracing and code-cracking efforts have revealed the origin of the radio transmissions, although not their purpose - they appear to be nothing but a continual sequence of numbers, spoken in a recorded voice in a language of the Concrete Endless. Speculation abounds as to why.
Enhance Fearful Symmetry
Study the symmetrical world, and try to work out how it got that way.
Fearful Symmetry

Archeological studies have revealed the origin and purpose of this world's symmetry: It was once used by the Endless as a setting for planet-scale games of nation development, expansion, and war. The symmetrical structure allowed for both "players" to have identical prospects. Real life, of course, is neither fair nor balanced.
Enhance High-Energy Plasmasphere
Construct additional pylons to stabilize the plasmasphere.
High-Energy Plasmasphere
Massive pylons on the planet's surface stabilize and direct the natural plasmasphere, giving the entire world a shield equivalent to your strongest bunkers.
Enhance Dust Halo
Study the dust halo, and try to work out if it really is sentient.
Dust Halo

The question of the sentience of these vast fields of fluid, reactive Dust have been answered. Although not intelligent on their own, they are able to bond with a Dust-enhanced individual, and boost that person's awareness across the entire planet's surface.
Enhance Artificial Life
Study the Crescent's curious affinity for artificial life.
Artificial Life
While the source of this Crescent's beneficial effects on artificial life still remain a baffling mystery, we have decided that even if we can't understand it, we can certainly exploit it.
Enhance Dust Accretor
Study the Crescent's ability to attract Dust.
Dust Accretor

The Dust-attracting substances of this Crescent have been identified, and although we don't have enough of the raw materials to deploy them everywhere, we've made the best possible use of what we had and turned this Crescent into a veritable dust bonanza.
Enhance Flickering Matter
Study the dematerializing matter within this Crescent.
Flickering Matter

The intermittently dematerializing matter of this Crescent has been fully stabilized - but can still be made immaterial again on command. The industrial sectors of the Crescent now make use of machines once considered impossible, with parts moving through each other in an elegant automated ballet.
Enhance Pseudo-Atmosphere
Study the crescent's atmospheric phenomena.
Pseudo-Atmosphere

A pseudo-atmosphere appeared during the creation of this Crescent. The way light passes through it creates unique visuals, and we've finally found some less-easily-distracted scientists to help study the phenomenon.
Enhance Dust Nebula
Study the dust nebula, and ensure it won't go back into "voracious self-replication" mode.
Dust Nebula

For some time, we were justifiably cautious that the remains of the self-replicating Dust experiment here might reactivate and devour the entire system again. After extensive research, we are at last satisfied that the Dust here has been permanently rendered inert, is indistinguishable from normal Dust, and no longer needs to be kept separate from it.
Enhance The Seventeen Thousand Islands Bridge
Develop the floating islands for new, luxurious, well-defended housing.
The Seventeen Thousand Islands Bridge

An archipelago of natural islands that span the gap between planet surface and space, hanging in the darkness like glittering stepping stones, and now covered with some of the galaxy's most desirable (and best-defended) housing.
Enhance The Fallen Gardens
Excavate the Fallen Gardens for ancient secrets of ship construction.
The Fallen Gardens

Though the local religious sects were strongly against any "defilement" of the ancient structures, they were variously convinced, placated, discredited, or simply ignored. The treasures dug up from within the gardens proved to be well worth the effort, as ships built here can use lightweight hull materials and exotic drive cores not available anywhere else in the galaxy. Certain people still consider these ships to be holy relics.
Enhance The Platform of Ys
Restore the military facilities of the spacedock platform.
The Platform of Ys

The enormous spacedocks above the planet, once the greatest shipyard of the concrete Endless, have been partially restored. Although no longer able to build fleets, they provide ample staging posts for troops.
Enhance Tree of Worlds
Study the Tree of Worlds and see if it can be replicated.
Tree of Worlds

Your species' finest bioengineers have, at last, worked out how to duplicate this magnificent tree - admittedly, only with this planet's unique geology, and only on a much smaller scale. However, on this world at least, buildings and even entire cities can be grown rather than constructed.
Enhance Tunneled Slipgates
Map the slipgate network and put it to good use.
Tunneled Slipgates

A natural anomaly whose probable existence is less than zero, this series of natural quantum-linked transport gates create “tunnels” from the planets’ surfaces to various points in the star system. Now explored and mapped, the smaller and better-concealed slipgates can be used to covertly move troops.
Clean Debris Field
Clean up the orbital debris around this planet.
Large Debris Field
The site of a major engagement between warring empires, the space surrounding this system took years to sweep clear of dangerous debris.
Clean Debris Field
Clean up the orbital debris around this planet.
Medium Debris Field
The site of an engagement between enemy fleets, the space surrounding this system took months to sweep clear of dangerous debris.
Clean Debris Field
Clean up the orbital debris around this planet.
Small Debris Field
Little reminder of the previous skirmish remains, even the orbital debris is no longer a nuisance.
Clean Pre-galactic Architecture
Clean up what remains of your battles with the former civilization on this world.
Pre-galactic Architecture
A minor civilization that resisted assimilation was conquered here, but only memorials remain.
Clean Pirate Stronghold
Prosecute any remaining pirates and deal with the mess they left behind.
Gutted Pirate Stronghold
A thriving pirate colony was laid to waste here, resulting in massive devastation and debris.
Clean Pirate Lair
Prosecute any remaining pirates and deal with the mess they left behind.
Gutted Pirate Lair
There was once a pirate hideout here, but only ruins and debris remain.
Clean Pirate Hideout
Prosecute any remaining pirates and deal with the mess they left behind.
Gutted Pirate Hideout
A small band of pirates once held this place, but they were driven out and only some debris remains.
Clean Apocalyptic Landscape
Clean up the battlefields of this war-torn world.
Apocalyptic Landscape
An enormous ground battle occurred here, and the planet will forever show the horrific scars.
Clean Devastation
Clean up the battlefields of this war-torn world.
Devastation
A ground battle took place here, and the planet is only slowly recovering.
Clean Trenches
Clean up the battlefields of this war-torn world.
Trenches
A minor engagement occurred here, but the evidence of battle is already disappearing.
Enhance Debris Field
Survey the remains of the orbital debris around this planet.
Large Debris Field
The site of a major engagement between warring empires, now swept clear of dangerous orbital debris. It also provided a wealth of survey data that you used to enhance locally-built ships.
Enhance Debris Field
Survey the remains of the orbital debris around this planet.
Medium Debris Field
The site of an engagement between enemy fleets, now swept clear of dangerous orbital debris. It also provided some helpful survey data that you used to enhance locally-built ships.
Enhance Debris Field
Survey the remains of the orbital debris around this planet.
Small Debris Field
A reminder of a previous skirmish, now swept clear of dangerous orbital debris. It also provided a smidgin of data that you used to enhance locally-built ships.
Enhance Pre-galactic Architecture
Study the remains of the minor civilization on this world.
Pre-galactic Architecture
A minor civilization that resisted assimilation was conquered here, and while no trace of the battles remain, we have since learned better ways of dealing with foreign species.
Enhance Pirate Stronghold
Repurpose the pirate technology for your own use.
Gutted Pirate Stronghold
A thriving pirate colony was laid to waste here. They left behind heavy surface-to-orbit particle cannons that have now been repaired for your own use.
Enhance Pirate Lair
Repurpose the pirate technology for your own use.
Gutted Pirate Lair
There was once a pirate hideout here. They left behind laser installations that have now been repaired for your own use.
Enhance Pirate Hideout
Repurpose the pirate technology for your own use.
Gutted Pirate Hideout
A small band of pirates once held this place. They left behind point defence guns that have now been repaired for your own use.
Enhance Apocalyptic Landscape
Repair the fortifications that still remain on this world's battlefields.
Apocalyptic Landscape
An enormous ground battle occurred here, and your own military has made good use of the miles of tunnels and bunkers.
Enhance Devastation
Repair the fortifications that still remain on this world's battlefields.
Devastation
A ground battle took place here, and your own military has made good use of the remaining fortifications.
Enhance Trenches
Repair the fortifications that still remain on this world's battlefields.
Trenches
A minor engagement occurred here, and your own military has made good use of the trenches and craters.
Reduce Ice-10
Develop construction materials that can build stable roads over the Ice-10 fields.
Ice-10

A rare form of ice that is caused by water crystallizing under high pressures, Ice-10 is interesting for its thermodynamic properties. A concerted effort by the planet's engineers has led to a lessening of its negative effects.
Reduce Permanent Monsoon
Begin terraforming efforts to bring the monsoon under control.
Permanent Monsoon
Once a very wet and very difficult environment, a concerted effort to partially terraform the planet has lessened the intensity of the winds and storms.
Reduce Metallic Waters
Develop artificial soils that can mitigate this planet's strange surface conditions.
Metallic Waters
Almost dirt-free, the hard, gleaming surface of this planet used to make agriculture difficult and potentially poisonous. Recent improvements in soil development, however, have eased the problem.
Reduce Aurora Waves
Deploy magnetic shielding to reduce the disruptive effects of the aurora waves.
Aurora Waves

The gleaming, multi-colored auroras that once caused such headaches have been partially tamed by magnetic shielding. Fortunately, their beauty remains even though their negative effects have been reduced.
Reduce Psychoactive Air
Spray fine crystals into the atmosphere to encourage heavy rainfall and sweep the psychoactive compounds out of the air.
Psychoactive Air

With an atmosphere that was once saturated by complex chemical compounds, life on this planet was challenging. Application of terraforming technologies, however, has rendered the effects of the air less intense.
Reduce Geothermic Activity
Set up the first wave of gravity control stations to get the planet's unpredictable mantle under control.
Geothermic Activity
Applying enormous amounts of energy and grappling with gravitational alterations, the previously uncontrollable geothermic activity of the planet is now somewhat less intense.
Reduce Seismic Activity
Set up the first wave of gravity control stations to get the planet's unpredictable mantle under control.
Seismic Activity
By manipulating the magnetic core, stabilizing continental drift, and improving construction techniques, the problems in daily life caused by seismic activity have been notably reduced.
Reduce Long Season
Employ a team of climate scientists, architects, and agricultural specialists to make life on this planet more pleasant.
Long Season

While the long orbital ellipse remains a fact of life, the application of terraforming sciences, advanced architecture, and improved agriculture has changed it from a health risk into a quaint tourist adventure.
Reduce Meteor Strikes
Deploy so-called "killer satellites" to shoot down meteors before they hit.
Meteor Strikes

For the first time in the history of the universe, the phrase "killer satellites" actually has a practical meaning. Thanks to cheap and robust sources of energy and heavily shielded orbitals, major meteor threats are neutralized high in the atmosphere.
Reduce Polar Tempests
Employ a team of climate scientists, architects, and cold-weather survival experts to make life on this planet more pleasant.
Polar Tempests
Controlled global warming, advanced thermo-efficient architecture, and really warm parkas have greatly lessened the negative effects of this anomaly.
Reduce Magnetic Field
Send a crack science team to see if they can develop a solution to the magnetic field problems.
Strong Magnetic Field
Once directed non-baryonic magnetic flux technology was reduced to handheld size, the negative impacts of this anomaly were greatly reduced.
Reduce Kessler Syndrome
Begin an unglamorous and expensive programme to sweep the debris out of orbit.
Kessler Syndrome
Though it took time, patience, and very large nets, much of the orbital debris that circulated the planet has been removed or dumped planetside for recycling.
Reduce Acid Rain
Deploy new, acid-resistant materials for use in construction - and see if you can do something about the fumaroles, too.
Acid Rain
Partially by reducing the effects of the fumaroles and partially by hardening the infrastructure, many of the problems caused by this anomaly have been alleviated.
Reduce Irradiation
Set up massive chemical plants to reinforce the planet's ozone layer.
Irradiated
By developing and improving the ozone layer and atmosphere while better insulating construction, a large part of the dangerous effects of this radiation has been removed.
Reduce Hostile Fauna
Have your top ecologists work on a programme of taming the local wildlife.
Docile Fauna
While the beasts of this planet were first described as "giant," "primal," and "impressive," these days the adjectives would tend to "controlled," "manageable," and "delicious."
Reduce Shattered Crust
Fund a vast programme of engineering projects to give this planet a functioning transportation network despite the landscape.
Tunneled Crust
Though the surface of this planet remains rough, a few engineering projects involving viaducts and tunnels have rendered this problem unimportant. Fortunately, the landscape remains impressive.
Reduce Poor Soil
Fund extensive deployment of new fertilizer factories.
Arable Soil
The soil of this planet, once sterile and barren, is now much richer in the organic life necessary for agriculture.
Reduce High Gravity
Overrule the population's objection to "insane, untested science" and "playing god", and power up the Graviton Bleed Engine already.
Acceptable Gravity
By the simple and straightforward process of bleeding excess gravitons across hyperdimensions into a parallel universe, the previously extreme gravity of the planet has been somewhat reduced.
Reduce Flickering Matter
Study the flickering matter, and see if its dematerialization is predictable.
Flickering Matter
The matter still tends to flicker, but it is now possible to predict these changes rather accurately. No more spontaneous disappearance of ships from construction hangars.
Reduce Pseudo-Atmosphere
Set up and promote a research group to study the pseudo-atmosphere.
Pseudo-Atmosphere
All it took was encouraging the study of the luminous phenomena of this pseudo-atmosphere for the inhabitants of this Crescent to regain their interest in science.
Reduce Low-Quality Foundations
Begin the long and unglamorous process of shoring up the crescent's foundations.
Low-Quality Foundations
After long and tedious efforts, every defect in the Crescent has been fixed. These all too frequent malfunctions are now just a bad memory.
Reduce Uninhabitable Area
Focus on reworking the crescent's structure to restore habitability.
Uninhabitable Area
The uninhabitable section of the Crescent has finally been reworked, everything is back to normal. If the Crescents were something normal in the first place.

Allows Anomaly Reduction
Anomaly Reduction lets you remove the negative effects of a Negative Anomaly

Allows Anomalies Enhancement
Anomaly Enhancement lets you increase the positive effects of a Positive Anomaly
Anomaly Enhanced
Anomaly Enhancement requires the [ecologistColored] #B0C65D#Ecologists#REVERT# to be the Primary Political Party
Click to select an anomaly improvement for this planet
